switch.name: propulsion/engine[0]/augmentation-ignition
switch.test: propulsion/engine[0]/PB gt 2.14 propulsion/engine[0]/augmentation-stage gt 0 propulsion/engine[0]/augmentation-alight eq 0

switch.name: propulsion/engine[0]/augmentation-alight-dmd
switch.test: propulsion/engine[0]/augmentation-stage ne propulsion/engine[0]/augmentation-alight propulsion/engine[0]/augmentation-alight ne 0 propulsion/engine[0]/thrust-lbs gt 100
propulsion/engine[0]/augmentation-stage gt 0 propulsion/engine[0]/augmentation-alight ne 0 propulsion/engine[0]/thrust-lbs gt 100

fcs_function.name: propulsion/engine[0]/EGTaug-C-dmd
fcs_function.description: Engine 0 EGT increment due to augmentation

function.description: PLA Vs Nozzle open area Exhaust Nozzle Control TO 15-15A-1 page 1-8

fcs_function.name: propulsion/engine[0]/oil-temperature-base-R
fcs_function.description:
Oil temperature (increment over external in degrees R). This is a function of altitude (density) and fuel flow because fuel is used to cool the oil. We end up with OilTemp = (alt, fuel-flow)
When the engine is not alight we use a different table.

fcs_function.name: propulsion/engine[0]/oil-temperature-degrees-R-0
fcs_function.description: Total temperature. We need this now because we will lag it and we need the lagged value for the oil pressure temperature factor (i.e. to compensate for oil thinning as it heats).

fcs_function.name: propulsion/engine[0]/oil-pressure-0-norm
fcs_function.description: The oil pressure is a function of oil temperature and N2.

switch.name: propulsion/engine[1]/augmentation-ignition
switch.test: propulsion/engine[1]/PB gt 2.14 propulsion/engine[1]/augmentation-stage gt 0 propulsion/engine[1]/augmentation-alight eq 0

switch.name: propulsion/engine[1]/augmentation-alight-dmd
switch.test: propulsion/engine[1]/augmentation-stage ne propulsion/engine[1]/augmentation-alight propulsion/engine[1]/augmentation-alight ne 0 propulsion/engine[1]/thrust-lbs gt 100
propulsion/engine[1]/augmentation-stage gt 0 propulsion/engine[1]/augmentation-alight ne 0 propulsion/engine[1]/thrust-lbs gt 100

fcs_function.name: propulsion/engine[1]/EGTaug-C-dmd
fcs_function.description: Engine 0 EGT increment due to augmentation

function.description: PLA Vs Nozzle open area Exhaust Nozzle Control TO 15-15A-1 page 1-8

fcs_function.name: propulsion/engine[1]/oil-temperature-base-R
fcs_function.description:
Oil temperature (increment over external in degrees R). This is a function of altitude (density) and fuel flow because fuel is used to cool the oil. We end up with OilTemp = (alt, fuel-flow)
When the engine is not alight we use a different table.

fcs_function.name: propulsion/engine[1]/oil-temperature-degrees-R-0
fcs_function.description: Total temperature. We need this now because we will lag it and we need the lagged value for the oil pressure temperature factor (i.e. to compensate for oil thinning as it heats).

fcs_function.name: propulsion/engine[1]/oil-pressure-0-norm
fcs_function.description: The oil pressure is a function of oil temperature and N2.
